MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL49 and LL52 postcode areas of Porthmadog and Criccieth, affecting properties in Penmorfa, Pentrefelin and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. We now expect your supply to be restored by 6AM via generators. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.47AM on 31st March 2021.March 2021.
